segments.text: What would be the earliest that I could actually move into my new house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The keys will be turned in on Tuesday night . The house will be yours at that time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What should we do to make sure that we have the electricity and water turned on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can tell the utility company what day you are moving in , and they will transfer the utilities to your name .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are a few things that we want to do to the place , like painting and carpet cleaning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take advantage of the house being empty to clean and paint . It will be harder to do after the furniture and appliances have arrived .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I asked the store to deliver my new appliances on the day we are moving in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will be good . You are going to want your stove and refrigerator right away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I could use some help on moving day . What are you doing on Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I am getting a fever and will be too sick to help you . Here , feel how hot my head is !
segments.speaker: S2
